title: Quick bee Agency branding + logo swap

requirements.summary: Update centralized site configuration brand name to “Quick bee Agency” so all UI reading siteConfig shows the new name.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/config/site.ts sets siteConfig.name to exactly "Quick bee Agency".
Header and footer (and any other UI that reads siteConfig.name) display “Quick bee Agency” without hardcoded old branding.

file_operations.description: Update siteConfig.name to exactly "Quick bee Agency" so any components referencing siteConfig render the updated brand.

requirements.summary: Update the HTML document title to use the new brand name “Quick bee Agency”.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html <title> is updated to include “Quick bee Agency” (and no longer shows the old generic project title).

file_operations.description: Replace the existing <title> text so it includes “Quick bee Agency” and removes the old generic project title.

requirements.summary: Replace the header/footer logo asset with the uploaded Quick bee logo and keep sizing stable on the dark theme.
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo and footer logo visually match the user-uploaded Quick bee logo.
No layout shift occurs in the header or footer; the logo remains approximately the same rendered size as before.
Logo has a transparent background (or blends cleanly) on the site’s dark/charcoal background.

file_operations.description: Add the exported wide Quick bee wordmark logo (512x256) with transparent background, based on the uploaded Quick bee logo, to replace the prior generated agency logo asset.
Update the header logo source to use frontend/public/assets/generated/agency-logo-quickbee.dim_512x256.png while keeping the existing rendered sizing classes (e.g., h-8 w-auto) to avoid layout shift.
Update the footer logo source to use frontend/public/assets/generated/agency-logo-quickbee.dim_512x256.png while keeping the existing rendered sizing classes (e.g., h-8 w-auto) to avoid layout shift.
